abstract: The business software maker Oracle made yet another acquisition on Tuesday with a $495 million deal to buy Agile Software, which specializes in software that helps companies manage crucial products.
lead_paragraph: The business software maker Oracle made yet another acquisition on Tuesday with a $495 million deal to buy Agile Software, which specializes in software that helps companies manage crucial products.

headline.main: Oracle Buys Agile Software in Arms Race With SAP
